name: Royal Laboratory
uniques: [+1 Science] from [Research Base] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Science] from [Artifacts] tiles [in this city]
New [Infantry] units start with [15] Experience [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: A laboratory that doubles as a military training center. Paid by BNC government.

name: Khigga Dancing Center
uniques: Prefab
Hidden when religion is disabled
Destroyed when the city is captured

civilopediaText.text: A large dancing stadium where they celebrate any joyous festivities with khigga, a circle dance of Assyrian origin. Now with psychedelics!

name: Center for Peer-to-Peer Creation
uniques: Destroyed when the city is captured

civilopediaText.text: The home of open source developers, you can ask them to create and contribute a new media or to improve it to the masses.

name: AI Commons Servers
uniques: Provides [2] [Digital Storage Space]

civilopediaText.text: An AI server for creating AI generated media and entertainment. The cost of making media here is almost free.

name: Intergalactic Bargain
uniques: [+1 Happiness] from [Luxury resource] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Gold] from [Luxury resource] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: A large bazaar dedicated for selling stuff all over the universe.

name: Sea Raider Outpost
uniques: Enables you to build Hydrofoil units
Military
Prefab
Must be next to [Coast]
Destroyed when the city is captured

civilopediaText.text: Used by BX to destroy hostile sea animals.

name: Open Access Center
uniques: [+2 Science] from [Research Base] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Science, +1 Culture] from [Artifacts] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Field Lab for the poor people. Free and Open Access research papers are available here.

name: Reaction Video Company
uniques: Prefab

civilopediaText.text: A building were they (the KRS Reactors) make reaction videos, a staple part of entertainment in KRS.

name: Content Farm
uniques: Prefab

civilopediaText.text: A large server building that creates and edits reaction videos for all citizens of KRS.

name: Lake Information Market
uniques: [+1 Gold] from [Lakes] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Gold] from [Bonus resource] tiles [in this city]
[+2 Gold] from [Luxury resource] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Gold] from [Strategic resource] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Sells research papers with information about lakes from all quadrants of the universe, they also sell tools and normal items aswell.

name: Church
uniques: Prefab
Hidden when religion is disabled
Destroyed when the city is captured

civilopediaText.text: Just a normal church where Christians pray in the name of God and Jesus Christ.

name: Preaching Networks
uniques: Provides [1] [Digital Storage Space]
[+1 Faith] <in cities with a [Harmony Garden]>
Hidden when religion is disabled
Destroyed when the city is captured

civilopediaText.text: Hang on with your favorite preacher on TV and listen to his gospel and words of wisdoms. You can even donate him for helping the poor.
